acceptance_criteria: Implement robust data encryption measures to protect sensitive user information.
Ensure that the application complies with all relevant data protection regulations and standards.
Regularly review and update data protection measures to address any new risks or regulatory changes.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide my personal details such as name, address, date of birth, and contact information so that I can be identified and verified.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to input their full name, address, date of birth, and contact information.
The system should validate the format and completeness of the personal details provided.
The system should securely store the personal details for future reference and verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload a government-issued ID for verification so that my identity can be confirmed.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to upload a clear image or scan of their government-issued ID.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide my borrower information including full name, date of birth, address, contact information, and identification documents so that my loan application can be processed.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to input their full name, date of birth, address, and contact information.
The system should allow users to upload identification documents.
The system should validate the completeness and accuracy of the borrower information provided.
The system should securely store the borrower information for future reference and verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to collect and verify the personal details of the applicant so that we can ensure the applicant's identity and contact information are accurate.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the applicant to enter their name, address, date of birth, and contact information.
The system should validate the entered data for completeness and accuracy.
The system should support uploading government-issued IDs for verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to collect and verify the employment information of the applicant so that we can assess their income stability and reliability.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the applicant to enter their employer details, job title, employment duration, and income information.
The system should validate the entered data for completeness and accuracy.
The system should support uploading proof of income documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to collect and verify the financial information of the applicant so that we can evaluate their financial health and creditworthiness.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the applicant to enter their bank account details, credit history, existing debts, and financial obligations.
The system should validate the entered data for completeness and accuracy.
The system should support uploading recent bank statements and other relevant financial documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to obtain the applicant's credit score from a reliable credit bureau so that we can assess their creditworthiness.
acceptance_criteria: The system should integrate with credit bureaus to retrieve the applicant's credit score in real-time.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to calculate the applicant's debt-to-income ratio so that we can determine their ability to repay the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should calculate the debt-to-income ratio based on the applicant's income and debts.
The system should display the calculated debt-to-income ratio.
The system should provide an interpretation of the debt-to-income ratio in relation to the loan approval criteria.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to specify the type of loan I am applying for so that the system can process my application accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide a dropdown menu with different loan types (e.g., personal loan, auto loan, mortgage).
The selected loan type should be displayed on the application form.
The loan type should be saved with the application data.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to enter the amount of money I am requesting so that the lender can evaluate my loan application.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide a field to enter the loan amount.
The loan amount should be validated to ensure it is a positive number.
The loan amount should be displayed on the application form and saved with the application data.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to specify the purpose of the loan so that the lender can understand why I need the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide a text field to enter the loan purpose.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to choose my preferred repayment terms so that I can plan my finances accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide options to select the repayment period and frequency (e.g., monthly, bi-weekly).
The selected repayment terms should be displayed on the application form and saved with the application data.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to provide collateral information if applicable so that the lender can assess the security of the loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to retrieve the applicant's credit score from a reliable credit bureau so that I can assess their creditworthiness.

acceptance_criteria: The system retrieves the applicant's credit history from a credit bureau.
The credit history is displayed on the loan officer's dashboard.
The credit history is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to calculate the applicant's debt-to-income ratio so that I can evaluate their ability to repay the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system calculates the debt-to-income ratio based on the applicant's income and debts.
The debt-to-income ratio is displayed on the loan officer's dashboard.
The debt-to-income ratio is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to verify the applicant's income using pay stubs, tax returns, and other relevant documents so that I can confirm their reported income.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload income verification documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to verify the applicant's employment using a letter from the employer or an employment contract so that I can confirm their employment status.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload employment verification documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to review the applicant's recent bank statements to assess their financial stability so that I can make an informed decision about their loan application.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload recent bank statements.

acceptance_criteria: The system applies a credit scoring model to the applicant's data.

acceptance_criteria: The system must integrate with regulatory databases to check for compliance.
The system must generate compliance reports for auditing purposes.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want clear disclosures about the loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations so that I can make informed decisions about my loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system must display loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations clearly on the application form.
The system must provide a summary of key loan details before final submission.
The system must allow users to download or print the loan terms for their records.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed of my rights and protections under consumer laws so that I can protect my interests during the loan application process.
acceptance_criteria: The system must display consumer rights and protections information on the application form.
The system must provide links to relevant consumer protection resources.
The system must allow users to acknowledge that they have read and understood their rights.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the loan application process complies with local laws and regulations so that the company operates within the legal framework.
acceptance_criteria: The system must integrate with local regulatory databases to check for compliance.
The system must generate local compliance reports for auditing purposes.
The system must provide alerts for any local non-compliance issues detected.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive annual information on the outstanding capital to be repaid so that I can manage my finances effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system must generate annual statements of outstanding capital.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that clear and legible records are maintained on a durable medium so that the company can provide evidence of compliance during audits.

The system must ensure that records are legible and stored on a durable medium.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to easily navigate through the loan application process so that I can complete my application without confusion.
acceptance_criteria: The application process should be straightforward with clear steps.
Users should be able to move forward and backward between steps easily.
The interface should be intuitive and user-friendly.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want clear instructions and guidance throughout the loan application process so that I can understand what is required at each step.
acceptance_criteria: Each step of the application should have clear and concise instructions.
Tooltips or help icons should be available for additional information.
The language used should be simple and easy to understand.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to track the progress of my loan application so that I can stay informed about the status of my application.
acceptance_criteria: The application should provide real-time updates on the status of the loan application.
Users should be able to see the current stage of their application and any pending tasks.
Notifications should be sent for significant updates or changes in status.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want access to a help desk or customer support so that I can get assistance with any issues or questions during the application process.
acceptance_criteria: A help desk or customer support contact should be easily accessible from the application.
Support should be available through multiple channels such as chat, email, or phone.
Response times should be reasonable and support should be knowledgeable and helpful.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want a FAQ section to address common queries so that I can find answers to my questions quickly.
acceptance_criteria: The FAQ section should cover a wide range of common questions and issues.
Answers should be clear, concise, and easy to understand.
The FAQ section should be easily searchable or categorized for quick navigation.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide feedback on the application process so that the system can be improved based on user experiences.
acceptance_criteria: There should be a feedback form or mechanism for users to submit their feedback.
Feedback should be collected and analyzed regularly.
Improvements based on feedback should be implemented and communicated to users.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the loan application interface to be user-friendly and accessible so that I can complete my application without difficulties.
acceptance_criteria: The interface should be designed with accessibility in mind, following WCAG guidelines.
The application should be responsive and work well on different devices and screen sizes.
The design should be clean and uncluttered, with a clear hierarchy of information.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want my personal data to be encrypted so that it is protected from unauthorized access.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to secure my account with multi-factor authentication to prevent unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-factor authentication is enabled for all user accounts.

user_stories.user_story: As a system administrator, I want to implement fraud detection mechanisms to identify and prevent fraudulent activities.
acceptance_criteria: Fraud detection algorithms are integrated into the system.
Suspicious activities are flagged and reviewed by administrators.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the system complies with relevant data protection regulations and standards so that we can maintain legal and industry standards.
acceptance_criteria: The system is audited regularly for compliance with data protection regulations.
Data protection policies are documented and communicated to all users.
Users are informed of their rights and how their data is protected.
Non-compliance issues are tracked and addressed promptly.
Compliance reports are generated and reviewed by stakeholders.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with credit bureaus for real-time credit score retrieval so that we can assess the creditworthiness of loan applicants accurately and efficiently.

Real-time retrieval of credit scores with a response time of less than 5 seconds.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with banking systems for automatic verification of bank statements and income so that we can streamline the loan application process and reduce manual verification efforts.
acceptance_criteria: Successful integration with at least three major banking systems.
Automatic retrieval and verification of bank statements and income details.
Secure and encrypted data transmission between the banking systems and our application.
Error handling and logging for failed verification attempts.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with payment gateways for seamless loan disbursement and repayment so that we can facilitate smooth financial transactions for our users.
acceptance_criteria: Successful integration with at least two major payment gateways.
Secure processing of loan disbursements and repayments.
Real-time updates on transaction status.
Error handling and logging for failed transactions.

user_stories.user_story: As a product manager, I want to monitor key performance metrics such as approval rates, processing times, and default rates so that I can assess the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the loan application process.
acceptance_criteria: Implement a dashboard that displays real-time performance metrics.
Ensure that the dashboard includes approval rates, processing times, and default rates.
Allow filtering of metrics by different time periods and loan types.
Generate reports that can be exported for further analysis.

user_stories.user_story: As a marketing specialist, I want to understand the target audience so that I can tailor the application to meet their specific needs and preferences, ensuring a better user experience.
acceptance_criteria: Conduct market research to identify the demographics and preferences of the target audience.
Create user personas that represent the target audience.
Incorporate user feedback to refine the application's features and user interface.
Regularly update the application based on changing user needs and market trends.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to clearly define the loan products so that users understand the expectations and the application can accurately assess and approve loans based on established criteria.
acceptance_criteria: Develop detailed loan product descriptions that include terms, conditions, and eligibility criteria.
Ensure that the loan product information is easily accessible to users throughout the application process.
Implement a system that matches user profiles with suitable loan products.
Regularly review and update loan product definitions to reflect market changes and user feedback.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to specify the required documents so that the loan approval process is streamlined and users provide all necessary information upfront, reducing delays and improving efficiency.
acceptance_criteria: Create a checklist of required documents for each type of loan application.
Ensure that the application clearly communicates the required documents to users at the beginning of the application process.
Implement a document upload and verification system that checks for completeness and accuracy.
Provide real-time feedback to users if any required documents are missing or incomplete.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to apply for a mortgage financing so that I can purchase a property without having to save up a large amount of money first.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to select 'Mortgage Financing' as a loan type.
The system should guide users through the mortgage application process, including property details, income verification, and credit assessment.
The system should provide clear disclosures about mortgage terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to select 'Bridging Loan' as a loan type so that I can bridge the gap between the purchase of a new property and the sale of an existing one.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to select 'Bridging Loan' as a loan type.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want assistance in selling my property if it does not sell within a few months so that I can expedite the sale process and manage my finances effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to request a revaluation of their property to set a lower price if it has not sold after several months.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about available subsidies and grants for electric assisted bicycles so that I can make an informed decision if I am considering purchasing such items.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display a list of available subsidies and grants for electric assisted bicycles.

The system should allow users to filter subsidies and grants based on their location and other relevant criteria.
The system should provide clear instructions on how to apply for each subsidy or grant.
The system should allow users to save interesting subsidies and grants for later reference.
The system should notify users when new subsidies or grants become available that match their saved criteria.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to receive regular updates about the status of my loan application so that I can stay informed throughout the process.
acceptance_criteria: The system should send automated updates to the borrower at each stage of the loan application process.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want clear communication of the loan terms and conditions so that I understand what I am agreeing to.
acceptance_criteria: Loan terms and conditions should be clearly outlined in the loan agreement.
The agreement should be written in plain language that is easy to understand.
The borrower should have the opportunity to ask questions and receive clarification on any terms they do not understand.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to receive an annual statement on the outstanding capital so that I can keep track of my loan balance.
acceptance_criteria: The system should generate an annual statement that includes the amount of capital remaining to be repaid.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the APR to be accurately defined based on my situation so that I can make informed decisions about my loan.
acceptance_criteria: The APR should be defined after studying the borrower's situation during the appointment with their advisor.
Mandatory insurance should be excluded from the amount of the monthly payments, the total amount due, the total cost and the APR.
The borrower should receive a statement of the interest accumulated on these amounts during the projected duration of the loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to be informed about the existence and availability of loan information and documents on the secure personal space so that I can access them easily.
acceptance_criteria: The lender should inform the borrower of the existence and availability of these information and documents on the secure personal space.
The information should be communicated by any means suitable to the borrower's situation.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the loan application process complies with local and international financial regulations so that we can avoid legal penalties and maintain our operating license.
acceptance_criteria: Verify that the application process adheres to all relevant local financial regulations.

user_stories.user_story: As a legal advisor, I want to provide clear disclosures about the loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations so that applicants are fully informed about their financial commitments.

user_stories.user_story: As a regulatory compliance manager, I want to ensure that the application provides annual information on the outstanding capital to be repaid so that borrowers are kept informed about their financial obligations.

user_stories.user_story: As a data protection officer, I want to ensure that all user data is protected and that the application complies with relevant data protection regulations so that user information is secure and privacy is maintained.

Ensure that the application complies with all relevant data protection regulations and standards.
Regularly review and update data protection measures to address any new risks or regulatory changes.

acceptance_criteria: Monthly installments should not include mandatory insurance costs.

acceptance_criteria: The loan duration should be clearly stated.

acceptance_criteria: Insurance costs should be provided in euros.

acceptance_criteria: A standardized information sheet should be provided with any document mentioning insurance costs.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan applicant, I want to provide collateral information if applicable so that the lender can assess the security of the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide fields to enter collateral details such as description, value, and ownership documentation.
The collateral information should be displayed on the application form and saved with the application data.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to retrieve the applicant's credit score from a reliable credit bureau so that I can assess their creditworthiness.
acceptance_criteria: The system retrieves the applicant's credit score from a credit bureau.
The credit score is displayed on the loan officer's dashboard.
The credit score is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to review the applicant's credit history, including any defaults, bankruptcies, or late payments, so that I can make an informed decision about their loan application.
acceptance_criteria: The system retrieves the applicant's credit history from a credit bureau.
The credit history is displayed on the loan officer's dashboard.
The credit history is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to calculate the applicant's debt-to-income ratio so that I can evaluate their ability to repay the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system calculates the debt-to-income ratio based on the applicant's income and debts.
The debt-to-income ratio is displayed on the loan officer's dashboard.
The debt-to-income ratio is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to verify the applicant's income using pay stubs, tax returns, and other relevant documents so that I can confirm their reported income.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload income verification documents.
The loan officer can view and verify the uploaded documents.
The verified income is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to verify the applicant's employment using a letter from the employer or an employment contract so that I can confirm their employment status.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload employment verification documents.
The loan officer can view and verify the uploaded documents.
The verified employment status is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to review the applicant's recent bank statements to assess their financial stability so that I can make an informed decision about their loan application.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows the applicant to upload recent bank statements.
The loan officer can view and analyze the uploaded bank statements.
The analysis of the bank statements is stored in the applicant's profile.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to use a credit scoring model and risk assessment criteria to decide whether to approve or deny the loan application so that the decision-making process is standardized and objective.
acceptance_criteria: The system applies a credit scoring model to the applicant's data.
The system displays the credit score and risk assessment on the loan officer's dashboard.
The loan officer can approve or deny the loan application based on the credit score and risk assessment.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the loan application process complies with all relevant local and international financial regulations so that the company avoids legal penalties and maintains a good reputation.
acceptance_criteria: The system must integrate with regulatory databases to check for compliance.
The system must generate compliance reports for auditing purposes.
The system must provide alerts for any non-compliance issues detected.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want clear disclosures about the loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations so that I can make informed decisions about my loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system must display loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations clearly on the application form.
The system must provide a summary of key loan details before final submission.
The system must allow users to download or print the loan terms for their records.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed of my rights and protections under consumer laws so that I can protect my interests during the loan application process.
acceptance_criteria: The system must display consumer rights and protections information on the application form.
The system must provide links to relevant consumer protection resources.
The system must allow users to acknowledge that they have read and understood their rights.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the loan application process complies with local laws and regulations so that the company operates within the legal framework.
acceptance_criteria: The system must integrate with local regulatory databases to check for compliance.
The system must generate local compliance reports for auditing purposes.
The system must provide alerts for any local non-compliance issues detected.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive annual information on the outstanding capital to be repaid so that I can manage my finances effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system must generate annual statements of outstanding capital.
The system must allow users to access their annual statements through the application.
The system must send notifications to users when their annual statements are available.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that clear and legible records are maintained on a durable medium so that the company can provide evidence of compliance during audits.
acceptance_criteria: The system must generate and store records of all loan applications and related documents.
The system must ensure that records are legible and stored on a durable medium.
The system must provide access to records for auditing purposes.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to easily navigate through the loan application process so that I can complete my application without confusion.
acceptance_criteria: The application process should be straightforward with clear steps.
Users should be able to move forward and backward between steps easily.
The interface should be intuitive and user-friendly.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want clear instructions and guidance throughout the loan application process so that I can understand what is required at each step.
acceptance_criteria: Each step of the application should have clear and concise instructions.
Tooltips or help icons should be available for additional information.
The language used should be simple and easy to understand.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to track the progress of my loan application so that I can stay informed about the status of my application.
acceptance_criteria: The application should provide real-time updates on the status of the loan application.
Users should be able to see the current stage of their application and any pending tasks.
Notifications should be sent for significant updates or changes in status.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want access to a help desk or customer support so that I can get assistance with any issues or questions during the application process.
acceptance_criteria: A help desk or customer support contact should be easily accessible from the application.
Support should be available through multiple channels such as chat, email, or phone.
Response times should be reasonable and support should be knowledgeable and helpful.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want a FAQ section to address common queries so that I can find answers to my questions quickly.
acceptance_criteria: The FAQ section should cover a wide range of common questions and issues.
Answers should be clear, concise, and easy to understand.
The FAQ section should be easily searchable or categorized for quick navigation.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide feedback on the application process so that the system can be improved based on user experiences.
acceptance_criteria: There should be a feedback form or mechanism for users to submit their feedback.
Feedback should be collected and analyzed regularly.
Improvements based on feedback should be implemented and communicated to users.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the loan application interface to be user-friendly and accessible so that I can complete my application without difficulties.
acceptance_criteria: The interface should be designed with accessibility in mind, following WCAG guidelines.
The application should be responsive and work well on different devices and screen sizes.
The design should be clean and uncluttered, with a clear hierarchy of information.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want my personal data to be encrypted so that it is protected from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Data encryption is implemented for all sensitive user data.
Encryption keys are securely managed and rotated regularly.
Access to encrypted data is restricted to authorized personnel only.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to secure my account with multi-factor authentication to prevent unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-factor authentication is enabled for all user accounts.
Users are prompted to set up multi-factor authentication during the registration process.
Users can choose from multiple authentication methods (e.g., SMS, email, authenticator app).

user_stories.user_story: As a system administrator, I want to implement fraud detection mechanisms to identify and prevent fraudulent activities.
acceptance_criteria: Fraud detection algorithms are integrated into the system.
Suspicious activities are flagged and reviewed by administrators.
Users are notified of any unusual activity on their accounts.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the system complies with relevant data protection regulations and standards so that we can maintain legal and industry standards.
acceptance_criteria: The system is audited regularly for compliance with data protection regulations.
Data protection policies are documented and communicated to all users.
Users are informed of their rights and how their data is protected.
Non-compliance issues are tracked and addressed promptly.
Compliance reports are generated and reviewed by stakeholders.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with credit bureaus for real-time credit score retrieval so that we can assess the creditworthiness of loan applicants accurately and efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Successful API integration with at least two major credit bureaus.
Real-time retrieval of credit scores with a response time of less than 5 seconds.
Secure transmission of data to and from the credit bureaus.
Error handling and logging for failed retrieval attempts.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with banking systems for automatic verification of bank statements and income so that we can streamline the loan application process and reduce manual verification efforts.
acceptance_criteria: Successful integration with at least three major banking systems.
Automatic retrieval and verification of bank statements and income details.
Secure and encrypted data transmission between the banking systems and our application.
Error handling and logging for failed verification attempts.

user_stories.user_story: As a developer, I want to integrate with payment gateways for seamless loan disbursement and repayment so that we can facilitate smooth financial transactions for our users.
acceptance_criteria: Successful integration with at least two major payment gateways.
Secure processing of loan disbursements and repayments.
Real-time updates on transaction status.
Error handling and logging for failed transactions.

user_stories.user_story: As a product manager, I want to monitor key performance metrics such as approval rates, processing times, and default rates so that I can assess the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the loan application process.
acceptance_criteria: Implement a dashboard that displays real-time performance metrics.
Ensure that the dashboard includes approval rates, processing times, and default rates.
Allow filtering of metrics by different time periods and loan types.
Generate reports that can be exported for further analysis.

user_stories.user_story: As a marketing specialist, I want to understand the target audience so that I can tailor the application to meet their specific needs and preferences, ensuring a better user experience.
acceptance_criteria: Conduct market research to identify the demographics and preferences of the target audience.
Create user personas that represent the target audience.
Incorporate user feedback to refine the application's features and user interface.
Regularly update the application based on changing user needs and market trends.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan officer, I want to clearly define the loan products so that users understand the expectations and the application can accurately assess and approve loans based on established criteria.
acceptance_criteria: Develop detailed loan product descriptions that include terms, conditions, and eligibility criteria.
Ensure that the loan product information is easily accessible to users throughout the application process.
Implement a system that matches user profiles with suitable loan products.
Regularly review and update loan product definitions to reflect market changes and user feedback.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to specify the required documents so that the loan approval process is streamlined and users provide all necessary information upfront, reducing delays and improving efficiency.
acceptance_criteria: Create a checklist of required documents for each type of loan application.
Ensure that the application clearly communicates the required documents to users at the beginning of the application process.
Implement a document upload and verification system that checks for completeness and accuracy.
Provide real-time feedback to users if any required documents are missing or incomplete.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to apply for a mortgage financing so that I can purchase a property without having to save up a large amount of money first.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to select 'Mortgage Financing' as a loan type.
The system should guide users through the mortgage application process, including property details, income verification, and credit assessment.
The system should provide clear disclosures about mortgage terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to select 'Bridging Loan' as a loan type so that I can bridge the gap between the purchase of a new property and the sale of an existing one.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to select 'Bridging Loan' as a loan type.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want assistance in selling my property if it does not sell within a few months so that I can expedite the sale process and manage my finances effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to request a revaluation of their property to set a lower price if it has not sold after several months.
The system should allow users to entrust their property to another real estate agency, or even to several, for more visibility.
The system should allow users to opt for an exclusive mandate with another agency.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about available subsidies and grants for electric assisted bicycles so that I can make an informed decision if I am considering purchasing such items.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display a list of available subsidies and grants for electric assisted bicycles.
Each subsidy and grant should include details such as the name of the program, the providing organization, eligibility criteria, application deadlines, and a link to the application form or website.
The system should allow users to filter subsidies and grants based on their location and other relevant criteria.
The system should provide clear instructions on how to apply for each subsidy or grant.
The system should allow users to save interesting subsidies and grants for later reference.
The system should notify users when new subsidies or grants become available that match their saved criteria.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to receive regular updates about the status of my loan application so that I can stay informed throughout the process.
acceptance_criteria: The system should send automated updates to the borrower at each stage of the loan application process.
Updates should include the current status of the application, any required actions from the borrower, and estimated timelines for next steps.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want clear communication of the loan terms and conditions so that I understand what I am agreeing to.
acceptance_criteria: Loan terms and conditions should be clearly outlined in the loan agreement.
The agreement should be written in plain language that is easy to understand.
The borrower should have the opportunity to ask questions and receive clarification on any terms they do not understand.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to receive an annual statement on the outstanding capital so that I can keep track of my loan balance.
acceptance_criteria: The system should generate an annual statement that includes the amount of capital remaining to be repaid.
The statement should be provided on paper or any other durable medium.
The information should appear in legible characters on the first page of the document provided to the borrower.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the APR to be accurately defined based on my situation so that I can make informed decisions about my loan.
acceptance_criteria: The APR should be defined after studying the borrower's situation during the appointment with their advisor.
Mandatory insurance should be excluded from the amount of the monthly payments, the total amount due, the total cost and the APR.
The borrower should receive a statement of the interest accumulated on these amounts during the projected duration of the loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to be informed about the existence and availability of loan information and documents on the secure personal space so that I can access them easily.
acceptance_criteria: The lender should inform the borrower of the existence and availability of these information and documents on the secure personal space.
The information should be communicated by any means suitable to the borrower's situation.
The borrower should be able to access these documents and information easily through the secure personal space.

user_stories.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that the loan application process complies with local and international financial regulations so that we can avoid legal penalties and maintain our operating license.
acceptance_criteria: Verify that the application process adheres to all relevant local financial regulations.
Confirm that the application process meets international financial standards.
Document all compliance checks and maintain records for auditing purposes.

user_stories.user_story: As a legal advisor, I want to provide clear disclosures about the loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations so that applicants are fully informed about their financial commitments.
acceptance_criteria: Ensure that all loan terms, interest rates, fees, and repayment obligations are clearly communicated to the applicant.
Provide disclosures in a format that is easy to understand and accessible to all applicants.
Maintain a record of all disclosures provided to applicants for future reference.

user_stories.user_story: As a consumer protection specialist, I want to inform applicants of their rights and protections under consumer laws so that they can make informed decisions and protect their interests.
acceptance_criteria: Identify and communicate all relevant consumer rights and protections to applicants.
Provide information on how applicants can exercise their rights and seek protection under consumer laws.
Ensure that all communications regarding consumer rights are clear and easily accessible.

user_stories.user_story: As a regulatory compliance manager, I want to ensure that the application provides annual information on the outstanding capital to be repaid so that borrowers are kept informed about their financial obligations.
acceptance_criteria: Implement a system to generate annual statements of outstanding capital for each borrower.
Ensure that the annual statements are provided on a durable medium and are easily accessible to borrowers.
Verify that the annual statements include all relevant information about the outstanding capital and repayment terms.

user_stories.user_story: As a data protection officer, I want to ensure that all user data is protected and that the application complies with relevant data protection regulations so that user information is secure and privacy is maintained.
acceptance_criteria: Implement robust data encryption measures to protect sensitive user information.
Ensure that the application complies with all relevant data protection regulations and standards.
Regularly review and update data protection measures to address any new risks or regulatory changes.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to see the fixed TAEG and detailed cost information clearly displayed so that I can understand the total cost of the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The TAEG should be prominently displayed.
Detailed cost information should be broken down and easily accessible.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the mandatory insurance to be excluded from monthly installments and total cost calculations so that I can see the actual loan cost without insurance.
acceptance_criteria: Monthly installments should not include mandatory insurance costs.
Total cost calculations should exclude mandatory insurance costs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to see the loan duration and the corresponding number of monthly installments so that I can plan my loan repayment schedule.
acceptance_criteria: The loan duration should be clearly stated.
The number of monthly installments corresponding to the loan duration should be specified.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to see insurance costs in a comparable format to the TAEG so that I can compare the costs effectively.
acceptance_criteria: Insurance costs should be displayed in a format similar to the TAEG.
The format should allow easy comparison between the TAEG and insurance costs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want detailed insurance cost information in euros and as an annual effective rate so that I can understand the insurance costs clearly.
acceptance_criteria: Insurance costs should be provided in euros.
Insurance costs should be provided as an annual effective rate.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want a standardized information sheet with any document mentioning insurance costs so that I can have a clear and standardized view of the costs.
acceptance_criteria: A standardized information sheet should be provided with any document mentioning insurance costs.
The information sheet should clearly outline the insurance costs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want any pre-offer documents to mention insurance costs in a comparable format to the TAEG so that I can make informed decisions before accepting the offer.
acceptance_criteria: Pre-offer documents should include insurance costs.
Insurance costs in pre-offer documents should be in a comparable format to the TAEG.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about the advantages of real estate loans, such as financing without immediate large sums, so that I can consider real estate loans as an option.
acceptance_criteria: The advantages of real estate loans should be clearly communicated.
Financing without immediate large sums should be highlighted as an advantage.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to consider personal contributions to reduce monthly payments or loan duration for car loans so that I can manage my loan more effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The option to make personal contributions should be clearly presented.
The impact of personal contributions on monthly payments or loan duration should be shown.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to ensure the total debt ratio does not exceed 35% for car loans so that I can maintain financial stability.
acceptance_criteria: The total debt ratio should be calculated and displayed.
A warning should be shown if the total debt ratio exceeds 35%.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to use TAEA and TAEG to compare total costs for car loans so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: TAEA and TAEG should be provided for comparison.
The comparison should be clear and easy to understand.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be offered free application fees for loans starting from 6,000 € so that I can save on application costs.
acceptance_criteria: Free application fees should be offered for loans starting from 6,000 €.
The offer should be clearly communicated to the user.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about the terms of use of the credit in credit card advertisements so that I can understand the terms before applying.
acceptance_criteria: Credit card advertisements should include the terms of use of the credit.
The terms should be clearly and prominently displayed.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want a non-contractual simulation tool for estimating total credit cost, monthly installments, and TAEG so that I can estimate my loan costs without commitment.
acceptance_criteria: A simulation tool should be provided.
The tool should estimate total credit cost, monthly installments, and TAEG.
The tool should be non-contractual.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want all costs and terms to be presented clearly and comparably so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: All costs and terms should be clearly presented.
The presentation should allow for easy comparison.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about the possibility of combining incentives like the conversion premium and ecological bonus so that I can maximize my benefits.
acceptance_criteria: The possibility of combining incentives should be clearly communicated.
Information about the conversion premium and ecological bonus should be provided.

The tool allows users to input loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
The tool displays the total credit cost, monthly installments, and TAEG based on user input.
The tool provides a disclaimer stating that the results are non-contractual estimates.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want all costs and terms to be presented clearly and comparably so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: All costs (including interest rates, fees, and insurance costs) are displayed in a standardized format.
Terms and conditions are easily accessible and understandable.
The information is presented in a way that allows easy comparison with other offers.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be informed about the possibility of combining incentives like the conversion premium and ecological bonus so that I can maximize my benefits.
acceptance_criteria: The interface provides clear information on available incentives.
The tool allows users to select and combine different incentives.
The tool displays the combined benefits of selected incentives.

acceptance_criteria: The system should validate premiums in kind against legal thresholds.
The system should alert users when premiums exceed legal limits.

acceptance_criteria: The TAEG should be prominently displayed on the loan details page.
Detailed cost information should be broken down and easily accessible.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to be informed about the possibility of combining incentives like the conversion premium and ecological bonus so that I can maximize my savings.
acceptance_criteria: Information about combining incentives should be clearly presented on the website.
The system should provide examples or case studies to illustrate the benefits of combining incentives.
